H0.text: Which US property tycoon bought Turnberry Golf Course in April. Donald Trump

H1.text: Which US property tycoon bought Turnberry Golf Course in April. Robert Pritzker

H2.text: Which US property tycoon bought Turnberry Golf Course in April. Stephen Schwarzman

H3.text: Which US property tycoon bought Turnberry Golf Course in April. Trumpian

A4.text: Donald Trump purchased the hotel and golf courses from Leisurecorp in 2014 for $60 million.
